Elements and Tags

This will be an explination regarding elements and tags.

All elements have open and close tags <> .

The arrows are called tags (<>) and the tag usually wraps a property wether H for Header, P for Paragraph

Ol or Ul meaning ordered list and unordered list.

The closing tag of an element consist of a <.../>

If it were a heading the element would look like this have an H in the opening tag <> and a closing tag H1/>

Void Elements

Void elements do not have a closing tag

    Elements that are considered void elements
  • The line Break
